text: Lydia in about 50 CE. Nais was a town of ancient Lydia, inhabited during Roman times. Its site is located about one mile (1.6 km) south of İnay in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Lydia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:History of Uşak Province Category:Ulubey District
title: Nais (Lydia)
